element.name: dtlsdec
element.description: Decodes DTLS packets
element.author: Patrik Oldsberg patrik.oldsberg@ericsson.com

element.name: dtlsenc
element.description: Encodes packets with DTLS
element.author: Patrik Oldsberg patrik.oldsberg@ericsson.com

element.name: dtlssrtpdec
element.description: Decodes SRTP packets with a key received from DTLS
element.author: Patrik Oldsberg patrik.oldsberg@ericsson.com

element.name: dtlssrtpdemux
element.description: Demultiplexes DTLS and SRTP packets
element.author: Patrik Oldsberg patrik.oldsberg@ericsson.com

element.name: dtlssrtpenc
element.description: Encodes SRTP packets with a key received from DTLS
element.author: Patrik Oldsberg patrik.oldsberg@ericsson.com

element.name: dtsdec
element.description: Decodes DTS audio streams
element.author: Jan Schmidt <thaytan@noraisin.net>, Ronald Bultje <rbultje@ronald.bitfreak.net>

element.name: dvbsuboverlay
element.description: Renders DVB subtitles

element.name: grabcut
element.description: Runs Grabcut algorithm on input alpha. Values: BG=0, FG=1, PR_BG=2, PR_FGD=3; NOTE: larger values of alpha (notably 255) are interpreted as PR_FGD too. IN CASE OF no alpha mask input (all 0's or all 1's), the 'face' downstream event is used to create a bbox of PR_FG elements. IF nothing is present, then nothing is done.
element.author: Miguel Casas-Sanchez <miguelecasassanchez@gmail.com>

element.name: handdetect
element.description: Performs hand gesture detection on videos, providing detected hand positions via bus message and navigation event, and deals with hand gesture events
element.author: Andol Li <andol@andol.info>

element.name: motioncells
element.description: Performs motion detection on videos and images, providing detected motion cells index via bus messages
